statements: UPDATE stores SET rent_cost = 1500, location = 'Downtown' WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE stores SET avg_daily_sales = 5000.00, customer_income_range = '$50k - $100k' WHERE store_name = 'Fashion Outlet';
UPDATE stores SET rent_cost = 2500, avg_daily_sales = 5000 WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE stores SET customer_age_range = '25-40', customer_income_range = '$50,000-$100,000' WHERE store_name = 'Downtown Outlet';
UPDATE Locations SET population = 10000, latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE Demographics SET avg_age = 35.5, education_level = 'Bachelor Degree' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE Locations SET location_name = 'New York City', population = 8500000 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE Demographics SET median_income = 65000.50, education_level = 'Bachelor's Degree' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE store_locations SET store_name = 'New Location Name', location_lat = 40.7128, location_long = -74.0060, demographic_data = '{"city":"New York","state":"NY"}' WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE retail_analysis SET analysis_result = '{"sales_data":[1000,1500,2000]}' WHERE analysis_id = 2;

UPDATE store_locations SET store_name = 'Main Street Store', location_lat = 40.7128, location_long = -74.0060, demographic_data = '{"population": 15000, "avg_income": 60000, "avg_age": 35, "city": "New York City", "state": "NY"}' WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE retail_analysis SET analysis_result = '{"total_sales": 50000, "avg_customer_age": 30, "popular_products": ["Shoes", "Clothing"], "analysis_date": "2022-01-15"}' WHERE analysis_id = 1;
UPDATE Stores SET store_name = 'New Store Name' WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE StoreAnalytics SET analysis_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE analytics_id = 100;
UPDATE Stores SET store_name = 'New Store Name', location_id = 2 WHERE store_id = 3;
UPDATE StoreAnalytics SET analysis_date = '2022-05-10', location_id = 3, demographic_id = 1 WHERE store_id = 5;
UPDATE StoreLocations SET store_name = 'New Store 1', location_point = 'POINT (40.7128 -74.0060)' WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE StorePerformance SET sales_amount = 10000.50, customer_traffic = 500, satisfaction_score = 4 WHERE store_id = 2;
UPDATE DemographicData SET population = 5000, median_income = 70000 WHERE store_id = 100
UPDATE CompetitionData SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor', distance = 10.5 WHERE store_id = 200
